concept.title: "Reserved for future use" items
concept.shortdesc: Certain items were designated in the DITA 1.x specifications as reserved for future use. These items are removed in DITA 2.0.

conbody.p: There is no migration path for items that were designated as reserved for future use. The OASIS DITA Technical Committee cannot offer migration advice for items that were never formally defined, as we cannot guess how implementations might have used these items.
